ArgolightBDataset.description: An Argolight sample pattern B dataset. This pattern consists of an array of circles

comment.description: A human readable comment about the dataset

experimenter.description: The experimenter that performed the imaging experiment

microscope.description: The microscope that was used to acquire the dataset

processed.description: Has the dataset been processed by microscope-metrics

processing_datetime.description: The datetime of the processing by microscope-metrics

processing_log.description: The log of the processing by microscope-metrics

ArgolightBDataset.title: ArgolightBDataset

channel_A.description: The first channel number to which the measurements apply

channel_B.description: The second channel number to which the measurements apply

mad_3d_dist.description: Median absolute deviation of the 3D distances between spots for each permutation of channel A and B

mad_z_dist.description: Median absolute deviation of the Z distances between spots for each permutation of channel A and B

mean_3d_dist.description: Mean of the 3D distances between spots for each permutation of channel A and B

mean_z_dist.description: Mean of the Z distances between spots for each permutation of channel A and B

median_3d_dist.description: Median of the 3D distances between spots for each permutation of channel A and B

median_z_dist.description: Median of the Z distances between spots for each permutation of channel A and B

std_3d_dist.description: Standard deviation of the 3D distances between spots for each permutation of channel A and B

std_z_dist.description: Standard deviation of the Z distances between spots for each permutation of channel A and B

argolight_b_image.description: Input parameter: image of the argolight b pattern provided as a 5D numpy array in the order TZYXC

lower_threshold_correction_factors.description: Input parameter: correction factor for the lower thresholds.  Must be a list with len = nr of channels or a float if all equal

remove_center_cross.description: Input parameter: remove the center cross found in some Argolight patterns

saturation_threshold.description: Tolerated saturation threshold. If the amount of saturated pixels is above this threshold,  the image is considered as saturated and the analysis is not performed.

sigma_x.description: Smoothing factor for objects detection in the X axis

sigma_y.description: Smoothing factor for objects detection in the Y axis

sigma_z.description: Smoothing factor for objects detection in the Z axis

spots_distance.description: Input parameter: distance between argolight spots

upper_threshold_correction_factors.description: Input parameter: correction factor for the upper thresholds. Must be a tuple with len = nr of channels or a float if all equal

channel.description: The channel number to which the measurements apply

intensity_max_spot.description: Integrated intensity of the most intense spot for each channel

intensity_max_spot_roi.description: ROI number of the most intense spot for each channel

intensity_min_spot.description: Integrated intensity of the least intense spot for each channel

intensity_min_spot_roi.description: ROI number of the least intense spot for each channel

mad_mean_intensity.description: Median absolute deviation of all spots integrated intensity for each channel

mean_intensity.description: Mean of all spots integrated intensity for each channel

median_intensity.description: Median of all spots integrated intensity for each channel

min_max_intensity_ratio.description: Ratio between the integrated intensities between the most intense and the least intense spots for each channel

nr_of_spots.description: Number of argolight spots detected for each channel

std_mean_intensity.description: Standard deviation of all spots integrated intensity for each channel

distance_key_values.description: Key Distance Measurements on Argolight spots

intensity_key_values.description: Key Intensity Measurements on Argolight spots

spots_centroids.description: Centroids of the argolight spots provided as a list of ROIs. One per channel

spots_distances.description: Table of distances between argolight spots

spots_labels_image.description: Labels image of the argolight segmented spots provided as a 5D numpy array in the order TZYXC. Image intensities correspond to ROI labels

spots_properties.description: Table of properties of the argolight spots

ArgolightEDataset.description:
An Argolight sample pattern E dataset.
It contains resolution data on the axis indicated:
- axis 1 = Y resolution = lines along X axis
- axis 2 = X resolution = lines along Y axis

comment.description: A human readable comment about the dataset

experimenter.description: The experimenter that performed the imaging experiment

input.description: An input element for the analysis

microscope.description: The microscope that was used to acquire the dataset

output.description: An output element from the analysis

processed.description: Has the dataset been processed by microscope-metrics

processing_datetime.description: The datetime of the processing by microscope-metrics

processing_log.description: The log of the processing by microscope-metrics

ArgolightEDataset.title: ArgolightEDataset

argolight_e_image.description: Image of the argolight e pattern provided as a 5D numpy array in the order TZYXC

measured_band.description: Fraction of the image across which intensity profiles are measured

orientation_axis.description: Axis along which resolution is being measured. 1=Y, 2=X

prominence_threshold.description: Peak prominence used as a threshold to distinguish two peaks.  Defaults to the value defined by the Rayleigh criteria

saturation_threshold.description: Tolerated saturation threshold. If the amount of saturated pixels is above this threshold,  the image is considered as saturated and the analysis is not performed.

channel.description: The channel number to which the measurements apply

focus_slice.description: Z position at which focus has been measured. One value per channel

peak_height_A.description: Height of first peak in the intensity profiles. One value per channel

peak_height_B.description: Height of second peak in the intensity profiles. One value per channel

peak_position_A.description: Position, in pixels, of first peak in the intensity profiles. One value per channel

peak_position_B.description: Position, in pixels, of second peak in the intensity profiles. One value per channel

peak_prominence_A.description: Prominence of first peak in the intensity profiles. One value per channel

peak_prominence_B.description: Prominence of second peak in the intensity profiles. One value per channel

rayleigh_resolution_microns.description: Rayleigh resolution measured in microns. One value per channel

rayleigh_resolution_pixels.description: Rayleigh resolution measured in pixels. One value per channel

intensity_profiles.description: Intensity profiles of the argolight lines provided as tables. One table per channel

key_measurements.description: Key Measurements on Argolight E images

peaks_rois.description: ROIs of the peaks found in the argolight images. One per channel

ChannelSeries.description: A series whose values represent channel
ChannelSeries.title: ChannelSeries

Color.description: A color as defined by RGB values and an optional alpha value

alpha.description: The alpha value of the color (optional)

b.description: The blue value of the color

g.description: The green value of the color

r.description: The red value of the color

Color.title: Color

source_uri.description: The URI of the source of the column

datetime.description: The datetime to which the comment is referring

Ellipse.description: An ellipse as defined by x, y coordinates and x and y radii

c.description: The c coordinate of the shape

fill_color.description: The fill color of the shape

stroke_color.description: The stroke color of the shape

stroke_width.description: The stroke width of the shape

t.description: The t coordinate of the shape

x.description: The x coordinate of the bounding box of the ellipse

x_rad.description: The x radius of the ellipse

y.description: The y coordinate of the bounding box of the ellipse

y_rad.description: The y radius of the ellipse

z.description: The z coordinate of the shape

Ellipse.title: Ellipse

Experimenter.description: The person that performed the experiment or developed the protocol
Experimenter.title: Experimenter

comment.description: A human readable comment about the dataset

experimenter.description: The experimenter that performed the imaging experiment

microscope.description: The microscope that was used to acquire the dataset

processed.description: Has the dataset been processed by microscope-metrics

processing_datetime.description: The datetime of the processing by microscope-metrics

processing_log.description: The log of the processing by microscope-metrics

center_threshold.description: Input parameter: relative threshold for what is going to be considered as the intensity center of the image

corner_fraction.description: Input parameter: the proportion of the image to be considered as corner or center

field_illumination_image.description: Input parameter: homogeneity image provided as a numpy array in the order TZYXC. While the analysis accepts multiple channels, the T and Z dimensions are expected to be 1.

intensity_map_size.description: Input parameter: the size of the output intensity map in pixels

saturation_threshold.description: Tolerated saturation threshold. If the amount of saturated pixels is above this threshold,  the image is considered as saturated and the analysis is not performed.

sigma.description: Input parameter: the sigma for the smoothing gaussian filter to be applied prior to analysis

bottom_center_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the bottom-center of the image

bottom_center_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the bottom-center of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

bottom_left_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the bottom-left of the image

bottom_left_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the bottom-left of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

bottom_right_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the bottom-right of the image

bottom_right_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the bottom-right of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

center_fraction.description: The fraction of the area occupied by the center of illumination region.

centroid_weighted_x.description: The x coordinate of the center of mass of the center of illumination region. In pixels

centroid_weighted_y.description: The y coordinate of the center of mass of the center of illumination region. In pixels

centroid_x.description: The x coordinate of the geometric center of the center of illumination region. In pixels

centroid_y.description: The y coordinate of the geometric center of the center of illumination region. In pixels

channel.description: The channel number to which the measurements apply

decile_0.description: The 0th decile of the intensity distribution of the maximum intensity

decile_1.description: The 1st decile of the intensity distribution of the maximum intensity

decile_2.description: The 2nd decile of the intensity distribution of the maximum intensity

decile_3.description: The 3rd decile of the intensity distribution of the maximum intensity

decile_4.description: The 4th decile of the intensity distribution of the maximum intensity

decile_5.description: The 5th decile of the intensity distribution of the maximum intensity

decile_6.description: The 6th decile of the intensity distribution of the maximum intensity

decile_7.description: The 7th decile of the intensity distribution of the maximum intensity

decile_8.description: The 8th decile of the intensity distribution of the maximum intensity

decile_9.description: The 9th decile of the intensity distribution of the maximum intensity

max_intensity.description: The maximum intensity of the center of illumination

max_intensity_pos_x.description: The x coordinate of the maximum intensity of the center of illumination. In pixels

max_intensity_pos_y.description: The y coordinate of the maximum intensity of the center of illumination. In pixels

middle_center_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the middle-center of the image

middle_center_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the middle-center of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

middle_left_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the middle-left of the image

middle_left_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the middle-left of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

middle_right_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the middle-right of the image

middle_right_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the middle-right of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

top_center_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the top-center of the image

top_center_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the top-center of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

top_left_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the top-left corner of the image

top_left_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the top-left corner of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

top_right_intensity_mean.description: The mean intensity of the top-right corner of the image

top_right_intensity_ratio.description: The mean intensity of the top-right corner of the image  divided by the maximum intensity of the center of illumination

center_of_illumination.description: Point ROIs marking the center of mass of the area of maximum illumination 90 percentile of the intensity. When the image is very flat, the 99 percentile is used instead. One point per channel.

corner_rois.description: Rectangular ROIs used to compute the corner intensities

intensity_map.description: Intensity map of the field illumination

intensity_profiles.description: Intensity profiles for the field illumination analysis in the different directions

key_values.description: Key-Value pairs containing the Key measurements for the field illumination analysis

profile_rois.description: line ROIs used to compute the intensity profiles

image_url.description: An URL linking to the image

shape_c.description: The shape of the image in the c dimension

shape_t.description: The shape of the image in the t dimension

MetricsDataset.description: A base object on which microscope-metrics runs the analysis

comment.description: A human readable comment about the dataset

experimenter.description: The experimenter that performed the imaging experiment

microscope.description: The microscope that was used to acquire the dataset

processed.description: Has the dataset been processed by microscope-metrics

processing_datetime.description: The datetime of the processing by microscope-metrics

processing_log.description: The log of the processing by microscope-metrics

MetricsDataset.title: MetricsDataset

comment.description: A human readable comment about the microscope

id.description: The unique identifier for an entity

serial_number.description: The serial number of the microscope

url.description: The URL where the microscope can be found

comment.description: A human readable comment about the dataset

experimenter.description: The experimenter that performed the imaging experiment

microscope.description: The microscope that was used to acquire the dataset

processed.description: Has the dataset been processed by microscope-metrics

processing_datetime.description: The datetime of the processing by microscope-metrics

processing_log.description: The log of the processing by microscope-metrics

fitting_rss_threshold.description: Threshold for the residual sum of squares of the fit to be considered good.

intensity_zscore_threshold.description: Threshold for the z-score of the intensity of the bead to be considered good.

min_lateral_distance_factor.description: Minimal distance that has to separate laterally the beads represented as the  number of times the FWHM of the beads.

psf_beads_images.description: The image containing the beads provided as a 5D numpy array in the order TZYXC. More than one image can be provided if the image conditions are the same.

saturation_threshold.description: Tolerated saturation threshold. If the amount of saturated pixels is above this threshold,  the image is considered as saturated and the analysis is not performed.

sigma_x.description: Gaussian smoothing sigma to be applied to the image in the X axis prior to bead detection. Does not apply to resolution measurements

sigma_y.description: Gaussian smoothing sigma to be applied to the image in teh Y axis prior to bead detection. Does not apply to resolution measurements

sigma_z.description: Gaussian smoothing sigma to be applied to the image in the Z axis prior to bead detection. Does not apply to resolution measurements

snr_threshold.description: Signal to noise ratio threshold to be used for bead detection.

fit_quality_x_mean.description: Mean fit quality in the x axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fit_quality_x_median.description: Median fit quality in the x axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fit_quality_x_stdev.description: Standard deviation of the fit quality in the x axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fit_quality_y_mean.description: Mean fit quality in the y axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fit_quality_y_median.description: Median fit quality in the y axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fit_quality_y_stdev.description: Standard deviation of the fit quality in the y axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fit_quality_z_mean.description: Mean fit quality in the z axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fit_quality_z_median.description: Median fit quality in the z axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

fit_quality_z_stdev.description: Standard deviation of the fit quality in the z axis for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

nr_of_beads_analyzed.description: Number of beads analyzed. One value per channel.

nr_of_beads_discarded_axial_edge.description: Number of beads discarded for being too close to the top and or bottom of the image. One value per channel.

nr_of_beads_discarded_cluster.description: Number of beads discarded for being too intense and potentially represent a cluster of beads. One value per channel.

nr_of_beads_discarded_fit_quality.description: Number of beads discarded for having a bad fit quality. One value per channel.

nr_of_beads_discarded_lateral_edge.description: Number of beads discarded for being too close to the edge of the image. One value per channel.

nr_of_beads_discarded_self_proximity.description: Number of beads discarded for being too close to another bead. One value per channel.

resolution_mean_fwhm_lateral_asymmetry_r.description: Mean lateral FWHM asymmetry ratio for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

resolution_mean_fwhm_x_microns.description: Mean FWHM for the analyzed beads in the X axis in microns. One value per channel.

resolution_mean_fwhm_x_pixels.description: Mean FWHM for the analyzed beads in the X axis in pixels. One value per channel.

resolution_mean_fwhm_y_microns.description: Mean FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Y axis in microns. One value per channel.

resolution_mean_fwhm_y_pixels.description: Mean FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Y axis in pixels. One value per channel.

resolution_mean_fwhm_z_microns.description: Mean FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Z axis in microns. One value per channel.

resolution_mean_fwhm_z_pixels.description: Mean FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Z axis in pixels. One value per channel.

resolution_median_fwhm_lateral_asymmetry.description: Median lateral FWHM asymmetry ratio for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

resolution_median_fwhm_x_microns.description: Median FWHM for the analyzed beads in the X axis in microns. One value per channel.

resolution_median_fwhm_x_pixels.description: Median FWHM for the analyzed beads in the X axis in pixels. One value per channel.

resolution_median_fwhm_y_microns.description: Median FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Y axis in microns. One value per channel.

resolution_median_fwhm_y_pixels.description: Median FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Y axis in pixels. One value per channel.

resolution_median_fwhm_z_microns.description: Median FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Z axis in microns. One value per channel.

resolution_median_fwhm_z_pixels.description: Median FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Z axis in pixels. One value per channel.

resolution_stdev_fwhm_lateral_asymmetry_.description: Standard deviation of the lateral FWHM asymmetry ratio for the analyzed beads. One value per channel.

resolution_stdev_fwhm_x_microns.description: Standard deviation of the FWHM for the analyzed beads in the X axis in microns. One value per channel.

resolution_stdev_fwhm_x_pixels.description: Standard deviation of the FWHM for the analyzed beads in the X axis in pixels. One value per channel.

resolution_stdev_fwhm_y_microns.description: Standard deviation of the FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Y axis in microns. One value per channel.

resolution_stdev_fwhm_y_pixels.description: Standard deviation of the FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Y axis in pixels. One value per channel.

resolution_stdev_fwhm_z_microns.description: Standard deviation of the FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Z axis in microns. One value per channel.

resolution_stdev_fwhm_z_pixels.description: Standard deviation of the FWHM for the analyzed beads in the Z axis in pixels. One value per channel.

analyzed_bead_centroids.description: The centroids of the beads that have been analyzed. One point shape will be provided per bead correctly detected. One ROI per channel.

bead_crops.description: The crops of the beads provided as a 5D numpy array in the order TZYXC. One crop will be provided per bead correctly detected.

bead_properties.description: Properties associated with the analysis of the beads. This properties include: dataset_id image_id roi_id channel_nr fit_parameters z_fit_rss y_fit_rss x_fit_rss considered_bad_z_fit considered_bad_y_fit considered_bad_x_fit resolution_fwhm_z_pixels resolution_fwhm_y_pixels resolution_fwhm_x_pixels resolution_fwhm_z_microns resolution_fwhm_y_microns resolution_fwhm_x_microns resolution_lateral_asymmetry_ratio

bead_x_profiles.description: The intensity profiles along the x axis of the analyzed beads as well as the fits.

bead_y_profiles.description: The intensity profiles along the y axis of the analyzed beads as well as the fits.

bead_z_profiles.description: The intensity profiles along the z axis of the analyzed beads as well as the fits.

considered_bead_centroids_axial_edge.description: The centroids of the beads detected but considered as too close to the top and or bottom of the image. Measurements not considered for the dataset analysis. One point will be provided per bead. One ROI per channel.

considered_bead_centroids_cluster.description: The centroids of the beads detected but considered as being too intense and potentially represent a cluster of beads. z-score over requested threshold. Measurements not considered for the dataset analysis. One point will be provided per bead. One ROI per channel.

considered_bead_centroids_fit_quality.description: The centroids of the beads detected but considered as the fit quality was not good enough.  RSS over requested threshold. Measurements not considered for the dataset analysis. One point will be provided per bead. One ROI per channel.

discarded_bead_centroids_lateral_edge.description: The centroids of the beads detected but discarded as too close to the edge of the image. One point will be provided per bead. One ROI per channel.

discarded_bead_centroids_self_proximity.description: The centroids of the beads detected but discarded as too close to another bead. One point will be provided per bead. One ROI per channel.

key_values.description: The key measurements of the PSF beads analysis.

is_open.description: Is the polygon open. By default, it is closed (false)

stroke_color.description: The stroke color of the shape

stroke_width.description: The stroke width of the shape

t.description: The t coordinate of the shape

vertexes.description: A list of vertexes defining the polygon

z.description: The z coordinate of the shape

Protocol.description: Set of instructions for preparing and imaging a sample

url.description: The URL where the protocol can be found

stroke_width.description: The stroke width of the shape

t.description: The t coordinate of the shape

x.description: The x coordinate of the top left corner of the rectangle

y.description: The y coordinate of the top left corner of the rectangle

z.description: The z coordinate of the shape

c.description: The c coordinate of the shape

fill_color.description: The fill color of the shape

stroke_color.description: The stroke color of the shape

stroke_width.description: The stroke width of the shape

t.description: The t coordinate of the shape

x.description: The x coordinate of the top left corner of the rectangle
